AMX.caption: enable screen share
AMX.doc: Determines whether screen share is enabled. Options are yes and no.
AMX.name: screenshare

AMY.caption: enable chat
AMY.doc: Determines whether chat is enabled. Options are yes and no.
AMY.name: chat

AMZ.caption: owner only broadcast
AMZ.doc: Options are yes and no. If set to yes, only meeting owners are allowed to turn on camera, unmute mic, and share screen. You can configure a meeting owner token with the Daily - create meeting token action
AMZ.name: broadcast

AMa.caption: enable recording
AMa.doc: Determines whether a recording is enabled on the call. Options are cloud,local,rtp-tracks,output-byte-stream
AMa.name: recording

AMb.caption: privacy
AMb.doc: Determines who can access the room.  Options are public and private
AMb.name: privacy

AMc.caption: enable knocking
AMc.doc: Turns on a lobby experience for private rooms. A participant without a corresponding meeting token can request to be admitted to the meeting with a "knock", and wait for the meeting owner to admit them. Options are yes and no.
AMc.name: knocking

AMd.caption: exp (unix timestamp)
AMd.doc: "Expires". This is a unix timestamp (seconds since the epoch.) Users cannot join a meeting in this room after this time. To convert a Bubble date format extract unix timestamps and divide by 1000
AMd.name: expires

AMe.caption: language
AMe.doc: The default language  for this room. Currently supported languages are de: German, en: English, fi: Finnish,  fr: French, nl: Dutch, pt: Portuguese, pl: Polish, sv: Swedish, es: Spanish, tr: Turkish, it: Italian, ka: Georgian, jp: Japanese, no: Norwegian, ru:Russian  user: Uses the browser's current language and defaults to English if not supported.
AMe.name: lang

AMf.caption: Use this action to create a new room through Daily's API
AMf.name: room_info_ln_2

ANV.caption: meeting join hook
ANV.doc: Optional parameter to set a URL that will receive a webhook when a user joins a room.
ANV.name: meeting_join_hook

ANb.caption: To unlock the below parameters, you'll need to add a credit card to your account. Visit https://dashboard.daily.co/billing to learn more about pricing and add your credit card details.
ANb.name: scale_info

ANf.caption: nbf (unix timestamp)
ANf.doc: This is a unix timestamp (seconds since the epoch.) Users cannot join a meeting in this room before this time. To convert a Bubble date format extract unix timestamps and divide by 1000
ANf.name: notbefore

ANj.caption: Below are optional advanced room settings to further configure the call experience.
ANj.name: advanced_info

AOp.caption: max participants
AOp.doc: How many people are allowed in a room at the same time. Default is 200. Contact help@daily.co if you need a limit above 200.
AOp.name: max_participants

AOq.caption: eject at room exp
AOq.doc: If there's a meeting going on at room exp time, end the meeting by kicking everyone out. This behavior can be overridden by setting eject properties of a meeting token.
AOq.name: eject_at_room_exp

APn.caption: enable people ui
APn.doc: Determines whether to display the People UI. When set to yes, a People button in the call tray reveals a People tab in the call sidebar. The tab lists all participants, and next to each name indicates audio status and an option to pin the participant. When enable people ui is set to no, the button and tab are hidden.
APn.name: enable_people_ui

APo.caption: video processing ui
APo.doc: Determines whether to display background blur controls. When set to yes, a participant can enable blur during a call.
APo.name: enable_video_processing_ui

APp.caption: enable prejoin ui
APp.doc: Determines whether participants enter a waiting room with a camera, mic, and browser check before joining a call.
APp.name: enable_prejoin_ui

AQi.caption: enable pip ui
AQi.doc: Sets whether the room can use Daily Prebuilt's Picture in Picture controls. When set to true, an additional button will be available in Daily Prebuilt's UI to toggle the Picture in Picture feature.
AQi.name: enable_pip_ui

AQj.caption: emoji reactions
AQj.doc: Determines if Daily Prebuilt displays the Emoji Reactions UI. When set to true, a Reactions button appears in the call tray. This button allows users to select and send a reaction into the call. When set to false, the Reactions button is hidden and the feature is disabled.
AQj.name: enable_emoji_reactions

AQk.caption: hand raising
AQk.doc: Sets whether the participants in the room can use Daily Prebuilt's hand raising controls. When set to true, an additional button will be available in Daily Prebuilt's UI to toggle a hand raise.
AQk.name: enable_hand_raising

AQl.caption: advanced chat
AQl.doc: Property that gives end users a richer chat experience. This includes:  Emoji reactions to chat messages, emoji picker in the chat input form and ability to send a Giphy chat message
AQl.name: enable_advanced_chat

AQm.caption: noise cancellation
AQm.doc: Determines whether Daily Prebuilt displays noise cancellation controls. When set to true, a participant can enable microphone noise cancellation during a Daily Prebuilt call
AQm.name: enable_noise_cancellation_ui

AQn.caption: eject after elapsed
AQn.doc: Eject a meeting participant this many seconds after the participant joins the meeting. You can use this is a default length limit to prevent long meetings. This can be overridden by setting eject properties of a meeting token.
AQn.name: eject_after_elapsed

ARK.caption: breakout rooms
ARK.doc: Sets whether Daily Prebuiltâ€™s breakout rooms feature is enabled. When set to true, an owner in a Prebuilt call can create breakout rooms to divide participants into smaller, private groups.
ARK.name: enable_breakout_rooms

ARL.caption: shared chat history
ARL.doc: When enabled, newly joined participants in Prebuilt calls will request chat history from remote peers, in order to view chat messages from before they joined.
ARL.name: enable_shared_chat_history
